var.name: tend_rho_artificial
var.description: Total horizontal momentum tendency from artificial tendencies

var.name: tend_u_artificial
var.description: Horizontal velocity tendency from artificial tendencies

var.name: tend_w_artificial
var.description: Vertical velocity tendency from artificial tendencies

var.name: tend_theta_artificial
var.description: tendency of coupled potential temperature rho*theta_m/zz from dynamics and physics, updated each RK step

var.name: tend_qv_artificial
var.description: Tendency of water vapor mass per unit volume divided by d(zeta)/dz
